description: Register as a publisher in the CloudFormation Registry.

AcceptTermsAndConditions.description: Whether you accept the terms and conditions for publishing extensions in the CloudFormation registry. You must accept the terms and conditions in order to publish public extensions to the CloudFormation registry. The terms and conditions can be found at https://cloudformation-registry-documents.s3.amazonaws.com/Terms_and_Conditions_for_AWS_CloudFormation_Registry_Publishers.pdf
AcceptTermsAndConditions.markdownDescription:
Whether you accept the terms and conditions for publishing extensions in the CloudFormation registry. You must accept the terms and conditions in order to publish public extensions to the CloudFormation registry. Required: Yes  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: Replacement

ConnectionArn.description: If you are using a Bitbucket or GitHub account for identity verification, the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for your connection to that account.
ConnectionArn.markdownDescription:
If you are using a Bitbucket or GitHub account for identity verification, the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for your connection to that account.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:aws(-[w]+)*:.+:.+:[0-9]{12}:.+  
Update requires: Replacement

PublisherId.description: The publisher id assigned by CloudFormation for publishing in this region.
PublisherId.markdownDescription:
The publisher id assigned by CloudFormation for publishing in this region.

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1

Whether the publisher is verified.
